page.title: 08Recreation
page.content:
Here are some of the most popular places for a days visit: { {A: Fairly near: {Langholm}for shopping and picnics {Hawick}for the swimming pool {Carlisle}for shopping,films and entertainment {The River Liddle}for picnics and swimming.
{B: Further away: { Newcastle,Edinburgh and Glasgow for shops,zoos,museums etc { Morecambe and Blackpool}for fun { Silloth and Powfoot }on the Solway Coast for picnics and beaches {Lowther Wildlife Park {Kielder Reservoir}for water sports and picnics {Bowhill and Drumlanrig}stately homes.
